app.title: Personality Quiz
app.basedOn: Based on the Big Five personality model

admin.noResultsDescription: No one has taken the quiz yet.
admin.seedHint: Run {command} in the backend to create test data.
admin.dimensionsLegend: E = Extraversion, A = Agreeableness, C = Conscientiousness, ES = Emotional Stability, O = Openness
admin.generatingTime: This might take up to a minute
admin.noInterpretationsDescription: This result was created before AI analysis was available.
admin.disclaimerText: Your personality isn't set in stone! These traits can change over time. This is just a snapshot of how you are right now.

home.title: What's Your Personality Type?
home.description: Answer 50 quick questions to find out what makes you, you. This quiz measures five key parts of your personality.
home.traitsSubtitle: Find out how you score on these five traits that make up who you are.
home.ipipDescription1: This quiz uses the IPIP-50, a set of 50 questions created by psychology researchers. It measures the Big Five personality traits that scientists use to understand how people think and act.
home.ipipDescription2: Unlike other personality tests you might have seen, this one is based on real science and is free for everyone to use.
home.footer: This quiz is based on the IPIP-50, a well-known personality test used by researchers.

traitDescriptions.extraversion: How social and outgoing you are around others.
traitDescriptions.agreeableness: How friendly, kind, and helpful you are.
traitDescriptions.conscientiousness: How organized and responsible you are.
traitDescriptions.emotionalStability: How calm you stay when things get stressful.
traitDescriptions.openness: How creative and open to new ideas you are.

questionnaire.question: Question {current} of {total}
questionnaire.selectOption: Pick the one that sounds most like you
questionnaire.savingDescription: Just a moment while we save your answers
questionnaire.saveError: Something went wrong while saving your results. Please try again.

results.title: Your Personality Profile
results.subtitle: Based on the Big Five personality traits
results.summaryText: Your top traits are {trait1} and {trait2}. These say a lot about how you act and interact with others.
results.disclaimer: Your personality can change over time! This is just a snapshot of who you are right now, not who you'll always be.
results.generatingTime: This might take up to a minute
results.noInterpretationsDescription: Click the button above to get a personalized breakdown of your results.

questions.1: I'm usually the life of the party.
questions.2: I don't really care about other people's lives.
questions.5: I know a lot of words.
questions.8: I leave my stuff lying around.
questions.9: I'm chill most of the time.
questions.10: I find it hard to understand complicated ideas.
questions.12: I say mean things to people.
questions.17: I care about how others feel.
questions.20: I'm not into deep or abstract ideas.
questions.21: I'm the one who starts conversations.
questions.22: I don't care about other people's problems.
questions.23: I get things done right away.
questions.25: I come up with great ideas.
questions.26: I don't have much to say.
questions.28: I forget to put things back where they belong.
questions.31: I talk to lots of different people at parties.
questions.32: I'm not that interested in other people.
questions.33: I like things to be organized.
questions.35: I pick up on things quickly.
questions.36: I don't like being the center of attention.
questions.39: I have a lot of mood swings.
questions.41: I'm okay with being the center of attention.
questions.42: I can tell when others are feeling something.
questions.45: I spend time thinking about stuff.
questions.46: I'm quiet around people I don't know.
